display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wXEUNqiCFAcQ7kNvwFuoiDh&_nc_oc=Adm1QsNrQT2ZlvnZsp0mX_yJkEUXj8KPkimREj2pZm7-XtDuWJSqo6YHhyAejyILeYI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Zn9Tv0jzJPue8ahC3LoxBQ&oh=00_AfpMtP6bFkH78nrlLD9pmwKbNbWlPjyoGGq56n1BfgviMQ&oe=69692FA1)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292712_2011949136257433_2240288442270214956_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZKoaMBmhjEMQ7kNvwFcVIvj&_nc_oc=AdlRbfRgy8tfthI4fGZP41LQ4sSaIC_PdZaN-5JMRTaRkphBJyn5R8Uvs578Kavl9U8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Zn9Tv0jzJPue8ahC3LoxBQ&oh=00_Afr_arGedns7_7z3ctNYy9CdHZvFBCgP8LLtgRUYTtK4Qw&oe=69692649)
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=bz7nmgkBfT4Q7kNvwHUNAKJ&_nc_oc=AdlQTYSzcQnY6Q7PMtsZ9b_5w4sQo3MFXVfhFy_WDSv64Xa9Ut31PHAmVSBrjjhvmo0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Zn9Tv0jzJPue8ahC3LoxBQ&oh=00_Afoo4TpDfdzgyOynb_fMpiPQ7_fvhJgU7LOfiHw0FqBhZQ&oe=69692ED2)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822813_1735619753788707_6789934812689609528_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fEXXgnpqLecQ7kNvwGAB_W1&_nc_oc=Adlz2RZwlftxkLI_eHW1GjMteEGYIZQPZR-do7DrzCRkP1FMFSaTHvJf74j4EYqeJOU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Zn9Tv0jzJPue8ahC3LoxBQ&oh=00_AfqYBy6w1KEOZNZDLay1lWqJE8u4PHHBToWjJz0ZXKLhDQ&oe=69695458)
